name: Golden Farewell
description:
There is propably few bugs and I hope it works xD 2 days whieeeev.... well i did something! Also WEBGL didnt work for me, it broke my game xD

I used unity 2020, Adobe photoshop and epidemicsound 

Controls: "WASD - move" "SPACE - jump" "L CLICK - attack" "E - Interact" "ENTER+ARROWS - dialogue"
